---
title: "Letterboxd Cleaning"
format: html
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
letterboxd_data |>
  head()

letterboxd_clean <-
letterboxd_data |>
  mutate(numerical_rating = fct_recode(Rating, "5" = "★★★★★",
                                       "4.5" = "★★★★½", 
                                        "4" = "★★★★",
                                       "3.5" = "★★★½",
                                        "3" = "★★★",
                                        "2.5" = "★★½", 
                                        "2" = "★★",
                                       "1.5" =  "★½",
                                        "1" = "★",
                                       ".5" = "½"))
```
```{r}
letterboxd_clean |>
  filter(!is.na(numerical_rating)) |>
  group_by(Movie) |>
  mutate(out_of_ten = (as.numeric(numerical_rating)) *2) 
```
